UPDATE system_administrator sa
sa.NICK_NAME = #{nickName},
sa.HEAD_PORTRAIT = #{headPortrait},
sa.PASSWORD = #{password},
sa.PHONE = #{phone},
sa.WEI_XIN = #{weiXin},
sa.QQ = #{qq},
sa.NAME = #{name},
sa.ID_CARD = #{idCard},
sa.EMAIL = #{email},
sa.STATUS = #{status},
sa.UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sa.REMARK = #{remark},
WHERE sa.ID = #{id}

UPDATE system_permission sp
sp.DESCRIBE = #{depict},
sp.IS_ENABLE = #{isEnable},
sp.EXTEND = #{extend},
WHERE sp.ID = #{id}
